text:
@CBSNews Thank you to Gov. Andrew Cuomo for being one of the few governors to tear into Donald Trump regarding his disastrous mismanagement of the coronavirus crisis.

Others are too scared to really tell it like it is, including New Jersey's Phil Murphy and Maryland's Larry Hogan. https://t.co/jcFNS81DyQ
